name: Poop, Bullets, and Nazis
description:
You are a bird who hates nazis, you must SUBMERGE a confederate SCULPTURE in your poop as you fly through the AIR.

The artist had to leave half way through the jam, so it is a little (extremely) rough.

WASD to move

Space or E to poop

Hit nazis with poop or your body to stun them

Cover the statue in poop to win

Fly near bushes to eat berries and reload
